import React from "react" import { useInView } from "react-intersection-observer" export default function Work(props) { const [ref, inView] = useInView({ threshold: 0.5, triggerOnce: true, }) const titleRef = useRef(null) const animateTitle = () => titleRef.current.classList.add("animate-title") return (

{inView && animateTitle()} M Y W O R K S

SEE ALL MY WORKS →
) }
